title: SmartUnderline
shortDescription: Instantly add beautiful underline styles to links on your site.
longDescription:
The typography of underlines on the web has lagged behind for a decade, but no longer! SmartUnderline is an [open source](https://github.com/CloudflareApps/SmartUnderline) library developed right here at Cloudflare Labs to give links the beautiful underline style used by some of the most respected sites on the web.

SmartUnderline works on most sites, but it does not support links which are on top of images or complex backgrounds. Try SmartUnderline to see how it looks on your site instantly.
author: Cloudflare Labs

categories.title: UI & Design
categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

categories.title: Recommended for Blogs
categories.description: Apps for blogs in the recommendation engine.

location.description: You may optionally specify a part of the page to apply SmartUnderline. Leave this blank to apply SmartUnderline to the entire page.
location.title: Location
